message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a truly unique item that I believe will be of great value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets within your acceptable range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for.  How about we split the difference and meet at $13500? I'm confident you'll find this product to be a valuable asset.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I am still not able to go above $12000 for this product. I hope you can accommodate this offer, as I am very interested in purchasing it.
